comments.body: Is the redirectUri the Oauth2 redirectUri or the URI of the original request that we redirect to once  the login flow succeeded? In case of the latter, probably at least a comment would be a good idea and maybe a different name. I donâ€™t really have an idea of what a good name would be tbh. Maybe `requestUri`?
It's the URI that the middleware should redirect to after the login flow completed. So, it's the URI of the original request. I'll add a comment pointing this out.

diffHunk:

+object Request {
+
+  case class Login(redirectUri: Uri, claims: String) // TODO[AH] parse ledger claims
